Record.ClassificationPath: Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Skin Diseases/Skin Abnormalities/Anetoderma
Skin and Connective Tissue Diseases/Connective Tissue Diseases/Anetoderma
Record.Description: Benign DERMATOSIS caused by a loss of dermal ELASTIC TISSUE resulting in localized sac-like areas of flaccid skin. It can be either primary (idiopathic) or secondary to other skin conditions, PENICILLAMINE use, or premature birth.
